title: An Early Look At Possible Contenders For Cigar of the Year
itunes:title: An Early Look At Possible Contenders For Cigar of the Year
description:
Well Rocky Patel was supposed to be a guest on The Cigar Authority even confirming it at IPCPR in Las Vegas. But, he’s on a well deserved vacation in Wyoming where evidently they don’t have cell phone service. We will still light up the Rocky Patel 15th Anniversary which is the first cigar from the August Care Package.

We will also take a look at contenders for the 2017 Cigar of the Year. What have we smoked that’s good and worthy of consideration at this point of the year. Will David, Mr. Jonathan and Barry find a common ground?

In the second hour, we will jump into our time machine and smoke something that was released at the August 6th, 2007 trade show.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority with cigar news, a trip into the Asylum and Debonaire Mr. Jonathan.

Join live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/
